title: High Gold/Low Plat Team looking for members
body:
Looking for active members.

We are currently 12 Wins 8 Losses last season. Highest Rank being Plat 5.

Haven't played in this team for over a year! 
Looking for all roles. Add me in game.
Plat Players only please.

How2TrainADragon

replies.body: Keen to talk more, ign: fwuzzy

hi i play ranked teams all the time and havent been able to find one that has the same people playing consistantly would love to join a team that is committed to playing other than it being a one time thing would be great if i could join yours
